meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Greening Initiative
agenda_items.description: Authorize a fundraising and community engagement agreement with the Trust for Public Land (TPL) for the purpose of providing funding for equipment, design, and development of five parcels of City owned land.

agenda_items.title: Big Cedar Wilderness
agenda_items.description: Authorize the addition of Big Cedar Wilderness (282.9 acres of land) located at 8600 Clark Road to the current Dallas Off-Road Bicycle Association Agreement.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Zoo
agenda_items.description: Authorize a construction services contract for the construction of the Dallas Zoo South Garage located at 725 South Ewing Avenue.

agenda_items.title: Multiple Use Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize a Multiple Use Agreement with the Texas Department of Transportation (TxDOT) permitting the use of right-of-way for maintenance, repair, and operation of trail improvements.

agenda_items.title: Cotton Bowl - Engineering Services Contract
agenda_items.description: Authorize an engineering services contract with Alliance Geotechnical Group, Inc. for the Cotton Bowl Renovation, Rehabilitation and Addition Project.

agenda_items.title: Cotton Bowl - Architectural Services Contract
agenda_items.description: Authorize an architectural services contract with Overland Partners, Inc. for the Cotton Bowl Renovation, Rehabilitation and Addition Project.

agenda_items.title: Cotton Bowl - Supplemental Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the construction manager at risk agreement with JE Dunn-Russell for the Cotton Bowl Renovation, Rehabilitation and Addition Project.

agenda_items.title: 2024 Bond Program: Update on Priority Project Lists
Bond Program
agenda_items.description: Consider and approve prioritized project lists as provided in the materials of the Bond Program Workshop.

agenda_items.title: Director’s Performance Review
agenda_items.description: Closed Session to discuss the evaluation and duties of the Director of the Park and Recreation Department.

agenda_items.title: Other/Non-Action Items
agenda_items.description: Staff Announcements – Upcoming Park and Recreation Department Events.

agenda_items.title: Next Park Board meeting
agenda_items.description: Next meeting scheduled for March 7, 2024 at 10:00 am.
